message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us.
Let's flip the script! 60-40 works for me, but I think it's a better deal for you than the previous round. Let's be fair and take this deal before the money loses value.
You tried to flip the script, but I think I can do better. 65-35 is still a good deal, considering the inflation is affecting you more than me.
Inflation is biting hard, let's split this 50-50 before we both end up with nothing. It's the only way to make sure we both get something.
You're feeling the pinch of inflation, I can see. I'll give you 30%, it's better than risking further devaluation.
We're both losing money here.  Let's compromise. I'll take 40% and you get 60%. It's the best we can do at this point.
